forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, overcast during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
